/* common.insertAdminEventLog */
INSERT INTO TB_ADMIN_EVENT_LOG ( EVENT_DE, MENU_PK, IP, PARAM_VALUE, REGISTER_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), (SELECT MENU_PK FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_TY_CODE != '10' AND MENU_ID LIKE '10001000%' AND URL = #{pageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1), #{userIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssUserNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE() )

/* common.insertErrorLog */
INSERT INTO TB_ERROR_EVENT_LOG ( EVENT_DE, REQUST_URL, MENU_PK, IP, PARAM_VALUE, ERROR_VALUE, REGISTER_NO, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), #{request_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT MENU_PK FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_TY_CODE != '10' AND MENU_ID LIKE '10001000%' AND URL = #{request_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1), #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{error, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ss_user_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE() )
